summary: New weapon, a dwemer greatsword (optional swords available too) inspired by the aetherium equipment from the Dawnguard expansion. No DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 0.8

Ok now we have two files, the original one and the other where you can craft a sword variant.

In both files, the Greatsword can now be found in Blackreach, in the Silent Ruin, it's just to the north of the dwemer city. Can't be crafted, but can be tempered now.

The other file will give the option to craft a sword variant at forges (dwarven smithing perk required)

Select either download. Only one. The stats of the weapons are just between the stalhrim and daedric sets.

Version 1.0 will be the one with Aetherium forge compatibility.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Add to your armory this unique and heavy greatsword, "lore friendly" hopefully, designed with the Aetherium Forge in mind. Custom hand-made mesh and textures. Hope you like it :p [color=yellow]You don't need any expansion[/color]. I left it without enchantments.. didn't want to get too deep into scripting and all that.


I don't have dawnguard right now so I couldn't make a recipe for the Aetherium Forge, if someone out there can make that ESP file, I will happily and gratefully upload the file to the nexus for everyone.
author: Erucci13

files.name: Aetherial Centurion Greatsword AND craftable Sword
files.fileName: Aetherial Centurion Greatsword AND craftable Sword-55071-0-8.rar
